description:
src/cmd/gc/bits.c: corrected a mistaken format;
src/cmd/gc/go.h: %E can accept uints.

messages.text:

src/cmd/gc/bits.c:154: fmtprint(fp, "$%lld", (vlong)i);
%d

http://codereview.appspot.com/5331041/diff/2007/src/cmd/gc/subr.c

http://codereview.appspot.com/5331041/diff/2007/src/cmd/gc/subr.c#newcode1466
src/cmd/gc/subr.c:1466: return fmtprint(fp, "%E <%S> %T", (int) t->etype, t->sym, t->type);
I don't understand the new cast.
